titles.title: American Legion Post #37 Federal Land Conveyance Act of 2018
To convey a parcel of land in Quincy, Illinois, to the American Legion Post #37, and for other purposes.
American Legion Post #37 Federal Land Conveyance Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
American Legion Post #37 Federal Land Conveyance Act of 2018
This bill directs the General Services Administration to convey without consideration, and on an as-is basis, a specified five-acre parcel of land in Quincy, Illinois, to the American Legion Post #37.
